register_heightmap_listener(callback: Callable[[ndarray], None]) → None[source]¶

Register a callback to receive decoded heightmap data.

Parameters:

callback – Function that takes (heightmap) where: - heightmap: np.ndarray of shape (N, 3) containing the decoded heightmap points

register_point_cloud_listener(callback: Callable[[ndarray, ndarray | None], None]) → None[source]¶

Register a callback to receive decoded point cloud data.

Parameters:

callback – Function that takes (points, intensity) where: - points: np.ndarray of shape (N, 3) containing XYZ coordinates - intensity: Optional np.ndarray of shape (N, 1) containing intensity values
